channel.title: Dividend Stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividend Stocks on FinanClub

item.title: AGNC
item.description: score:-111 Chances: AGNC Investment (AGNC) is a wise investment option at present due to an active portfolio-management strategy, decent liquidity and an attractive ROE. MPLX should have plenty of fuel to continue growing its big-time payout. Risks: Unusually high dividend yields are typically a sign of trouble ahead, but billionaire investors are eager to buy these stocks, according to their latest disclosures.

item.title: O
item.description: score:-111 Chances: Realty Income Corp. (O) should be added to one’s portfolio based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR). These monthly dividend payers are offering something few stocks can, making them attractive for investment. Risks: Wall Street analysts’ overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of the highly sought-after metric of average brokerage recommendation (ABR).
